items.content_html: A lightweight, dependency-free JavaScript testing utility. This project is framework-agnostic and usable in both browser and Node.js environments.

items.content_html: 2025 SJHacks Hackathon Submission (Team #4) - HelpHub is a lightweight, mobile-optimized web app that empowers residents and visitors to access emergency assistance, city services, and community support with a simple QR scan.

items.content_html: Linky — A lightweight, fast API server for controlling HomeKit devices remotely through Homebridge. Full REST API with secure authentication, dynamic key rotation, health metrics, and future WebSocket support.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: Background Changer is a lightweight web application that demonstrates the power of React state management and dynamic styling. Users can instantly switch between different background colors with a click of a button, providing a smooth and engaging user experience.
items.title: prachipatil2005/bg-changer: Background Changer is a lightweight web application that demonstrates the power of React state management and dynamic styling. Users can instantly switch between different background colors with a click of a button, providing a smooth and engaging user experience.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀
items.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀

items.content_html: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
items.title: ShaAnder/Ping_Me_Frontend: Part 1 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the front end component to the application utilizing react and typescript to build a scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests
